inclusion.criterion: Referred for isolated aortic or mitral valve repair or replacement due to valve regurgitation
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Metallic contraindications to MRI (e.g. noncompatible aneurysm clip etc)
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Planned concomitant cardiac surgical procedure such as coronary artery bypass, septal myomectomy, or other valve procedure.
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: More than mild mitral or aortic stenosis.
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: For patients enrolled with mitral regurgitation: greater than mild aortic regurgitation.
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: For patients enrolled with aortic regurgitation: greater than mild mitral regurgitation.
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: Patient has Marfan's syndrome and known severe mitral valve prolapse with regurgitation, but remains symptomatic and is prepared to undergo surgery.
